NAEB RADIO NETWORK
PROGRAM OFFERING PROGRAM OFFERING
Title: A MAN IN AFRICA
Type: Documentary
Time: 14:30
No,: 4 to finish series
Origin: WOI
Audience: General
Serial Number: 57-5
Release Date: Issue 14 (April 7)
This quarter we present the four final programs of this series recorded in Africa
by Clarence (Skip) Westphal.
Program
Issue
Topic
14.
14
nA Matter of Opinion” - Skip interviews some
long-time residents of Africa who have interest'
ing opinions.
15.
15
”The Belgian Congo” - Skip flies over the Congo
and chats with those who go with him.
16.
16
”Dr. Schweitzer” - Skip visits the mission
hospital of Dr. Albert Schweitzer.
17.
17
”African Coffee Plantation” - Skip records
the sounds of African agriculture.
